name: Spellcheck Action
on: 
  push:
    paths:
      - 'README.md'
      - 'docs/*.md'
  pull_request:
    paths:
      - '**.md'  

jobs:
  build:
    name: Spellcheck
    runs-on: ubuntu-20.04
    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@master
    - uses: rojopolis/spellcheck-github-actions@0.5.0
      name: Spellcheck
